name: file-manager
description: Local filesystem operations: list directory, read file, write file, search files. Runs on the desktop client via Tauri FS API.
author: AgentOS

functions.name: list_directory
functions.description: List files and directories in a given path

functions.name: read_file
functions.description: Read the contents of a text file

functions.name: write_file
functions.description: Write content to a file (creates or overwrites)

content.description: Content to write to the file

functions.name: search_files
functions.description: Search for files matching a pattern in a directory

pattern.description: Glob pattern or filename to search for
